title: cmd/gc: spurious "fallthrough statement out of place"
body:
go version devel +4a839bf01b58 Tue May 20 15:52:08 2014 +1000 + linux/amd64

http://play.golang.org/p/iVY1-AI1B2

$ go build src.go 
src.go:11: fallthrough statement out of place

Works on playground, so probably with Go1.2 as well.

After s/foo(0)/0/ it compiles successfully.
